meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>small</kanji> <kanji>theory</kanji> is some idea you have that you put on paper. Perhaps it's an idea about life, that you write in the form of a <vocabulary>novel</vocabulary>?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
